data.message: Hi. I have been having trouble accessing my company's Ads Manager for the past 2 days. Our whole team is experiencing this problem on our desktops where the page remains loading. It appears to be working fine on mobile. Can you offer any assistance?

replies.message: Hi Paulo. Please help our team track this issue by reporting it with these tips from our Help Center: http://bit.ly/2ooAo1A. Thanks. -Jessica
Reported the problem and haven't heard anything back. Problem is persisting and preventing us from obtaining information that we need.
Hi Paulo. You may have the option to check the status of your report in the Support Dashboard here: http://bit.ly/2pdhYRg. Thanks! -Joe

Paulo Semedo Complain about them here, most companies/corporations reply if you file a complaint with the Better Business Bureau. Im giving this link out like how Oprah gave out free cars since Facebook has ignored my problem with uploading pics for 3 days. Ive seen people on this page get ignored for MONTHS by facebook. https://www.bbb.org/greater-san-francisco/business-reviews/online-social-media-networking/facebook-in-menlo-park-ca-385674/reviews-and-complaints
Hire more employees Facebook if the complaint load is too much for you, maybe cut Zuckerburg's pay by 10 percent & u can hire people to answer and solve questions in an efficient matter.
